summary: When a young girl is found dead an inspector is sent to investigate a prosperous Yorkshire household. It emerges that each member of the family has a guilty secret - each one is partly responsible for her death.
cast: Alastair Sim|Olga Lindo|Arthur Young|Brian Worth|Eileen Moore|Bryan Forbes|Jane Wenham|George Woodbridge|Barbara Everest|Charles Saynor|Olwen Brookes|John Welsh|Frances Gowens|Norman Bird|Helen Cleverley|George Cole|Walter Cross|Brenda Duncan|Vi Endean|Mabel Etherington|Victor Harrington|George Hirste|Jenny Jones|Pat Neal|Paul Phillips|Bill Raymond|Winnie Wiblin|Catherine Willmer
keywords: police inspector|parent grown child relationship|year 1912|class differences|corruption
title: An Inspector Calls
